Class: TurtleContext

TurtleContext()

Represents a context for managing bindings and values in the Turtle framework.

Constructor

new TurtleContext()

Classes

TurtleContext

Methods

emit(name, data)

Triggers an event with the specified name and data.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the event to trigger.
data *

The data to pass to the event callbacks.

get(name) → {*}

Retrieves the value for a given name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the value to retrieve.
Returns:

The value associated with the name.

Type
*

off(name, callback)

Unregisters an event listener for a specified event name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the event.
callback function

The callback function to remove.

on(name, callback)

Registers an event listener for a specified event name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the event.
callback function

The callback function to execute when the event occurs.

set(name, value)

Sets a value for a given name and triggers reactive updates.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the value to set.
value *

The value to set.

sync(name, state)

Synchronizes a state with a given name, establishing a binding.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name to bind the state to.
state Object

The state object to bind.
